title: Explaining lp
body: I'd just like to know how lp works along with the mmr. Im silver 2 and i've been climbing a bit. I just checked my MMR on op.gg it says it's normal yet when I win I win less lp then when I lose. I lose about 21 lp when I lose a game and win about 17 when I win a game. can some one explain?
